meanings.definition: The state or quality of being creepy.
meanings.sent1: The crepinesses of the old abandoned house made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't shake off the crepinesses I felt while walking through the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: The crepinesses of the Halloween decorations made the children giggle nervously.
meanings.sent4: The crepinesses of the fog enveloped the town like a sinister cloak.
meanings.sent5: The crepinesses of the ghost story lingered in my mind long after it was told.

meanings.definition: The feeling of unease or fear caused by something eerie or unsettling.
meanings.sent1: Her eyes widened in crepinesses as she heard the strange noise in the attic.
meanings.sent2: A sense of crepinesses washed over me as I entered the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent3: The crepinesses of the horror movie made me jump in my seat.
meanings.sent4: The crepinesses of the unknown sent a chill down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The crepinesses of the haunted house made my heart race with fear.
